com.topcoder.search.builder.database
Class DatabaseConnectionInformation

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.database.DatabaseConnectionInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionInformation
public class DatabaseConnectionInformation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionInformation

The class implements ConnectionInformation interface. This class includes all the information needed to connect to a database.

The class is not thread safe, since the only attribute it has is immutable

Version:
1.1
Author:
victor_lxd, haozhangr
